descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][size=6]                                                    APPO   [/size][/color]                                                                                                                      


Players home.   Whiterun.               

To get to APPO open map see pics for location then teleport there. 

To get a good idea of APPO look through the pics. 

 APPO has manniquins, weapon racks, soil for planting, tanning rack forge smelter ETC. 

I have tested the navmesh with a follower and encountered no problems.

[color=#f1c232]
Requirements:          Dawnguard.Hearthfire.Dragonborn.

[/color][color=#f1c232]
Installation:             Just download with Nexus mod manger, Mod organizer or manual,if you want to install it manually,                                                                                              then you have to extract it into your data file for Skyrim.
[/color][color=#f1c232]
Unistallation:         Just untick in mod manger or mod organzier or delete the files you manually installed[/color].


[color=#00ff00][size=4]CREDITS:                 Many thanks to.
